properties.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 8 at 3:49PM PST until January 9 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Zero visibility is likely in freezing fog.

* WHERE...Tehachapi Area.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Thursday morning.

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility
and potential frost on bridges.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Black ice may develop along Highway 58 over
Tehachapi Pass as the air mass is saturated, with a near
freezing temperature at Tehachapi Municipal Airport. Black ice
is difficult to see and makes roads very slippery, especially on
bridges and overpasses.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use low beam headlights, and keep plenty of
distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
Also, be alert for black ice causing slippery roads.

NWSheadline: A FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THURSDAY MORNING
